definition: to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots
Journey to the West, Ming dynasty novel by Wu Cheng'en 吳承恩|吴承恩, one of the Four Classic Novels of Chinese literature/also called Pilgrimage to the West or Monkey
one of three Ming dynasty sequels to Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记
Xu Xiake's Travel Diaries, a book of travel records by 徐霞客[Xu2 Xia2 ke4] on geology, geography, plants etc
one of three Ming dynasty sequels to Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记
The Travels of Lao Tsan, novel by late Qing novelist Liu E 劉鶚|刘鹗[Liu2 E4]

sentences.english: The journey of the west consists has many characters, mostly mythical creatures.
sentences.chinese: 西游记包括许多章节，大部分虚构的生物。

sentences.english: Andersen also wrote travelogs4 while he traveled through different countries.
sentences.chinese: 安徒生在周游列国时也写了游记。

sentences.english: The literature of the 19th century is rich with great travel writing.
sentences.chinese: 19世纪的文学是游记名篇的渊薮。

sentences.english: It was said that the writer of Journey to the West was Qiu Chuji the originator of Quanzhen denomination.
sentences.chinese: 古传《西游记》是全真教龙门派开创者丘处机所撰。

sentences.english: Andersen also wrote travelogs while he traveled through different countries.
sentences.chinese: 安徒生在周游列国时也写了游记。

sentences.english: This stour describes two characters from journey to the West.
sentences.chinese: 千里眼和顺风耳是《西游记》中的两个人物。

sentences.english: Here you can find a collection of travelogues of the places we have been travelled to recent years.
sentences.chinese: 在这里汇总了我们近几年来的一些游记。

sentences.english: Gulliver's Travels. You know? The Houyhnhnms?
sentences.chinese: 格列佛游记，你知道吗？慧马国。

sentences.english: Journey to the West, Feng Mengbo Solo, Bund 3 Gallery, Shanghai, China.
sentences.chinese: 《西游记》冯梦波个展，沪申画廊，中国上海。

sentences.english: Travels" is still a controversial concept."
sentences.chinese: 游记至今仍是一个众说不一的概念。

sentences.english: It pokes fun at the travelogues of this time period.
sentences.chinese: 它戳在这段时间内的游记乐趣。

sentences.english: A biography of George Borrow, the author of novels and travelogues, some scandalous.
sentences.chinese: 阿乔治借用，小说和游记作家传记，一些丑闻。

sentences.english: In the Chinese classic Journey to the West, who does Sun Wukong meet in his first challenge?
sentences.chinese: 在《西游记》里，孙悟空斩妖除魔的第一关遇到谁？

sentences.english: Do you remember yahoo in Gullivers Travels?
sentences.chinese: 记得《格列佛游记》里的耶胡吗？

sentences.english: Jet:The movie is loosely based on the classic Chinese novel Journey to the West.
sentences.chinese: 这部电影是根据中国古典名著《西游记》改编的。

definition: various notes or records/a miscellany/scattered jottings
Journey to the West, Ming dynasty novel by Wu Cheng'en 吳承恩|吴承恩, one of the Four Classic Novels of Chinese literature/also called Pilgrimage to the West or Monkey
Great Tang Records on the Western Regions, travel record of Xuan Zang 玄奘[Xuan2 zang4], compiled by 辯機|辩机[Bian4 ji1] in 646
impression of a book/opinion expressed in a book review
Wu Cheng'en (1500-1582), author (or compiler) of novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记
